'''''Mobs Rule!''''' is the second installment of the ''[[Minecraft: Stonesword Saga]]'' series, authored by [[Nick Eliopulos]].

== Synopsis ==
{{quote|Based on the most popular video game of all time, this all-new chapter book series takes a group of intrepid [[Minecraft]] players deeper into the game than ever before. Something has turned the [[Evoker King]] to stone, and elements of his code have turned into new and terrible bosses that threaten the digital world of Minecraft. Now [[Po Chen|Po]], [[Harper Houston|Harper]], and their friends must travel deep into underground and into a web of danger to face the one of them. But that's the easy part, because in the real world, Po decides to run for class president and before he knows it, the ground feels like it is opening under his feet and his popularity is about to plummet!|author=Description<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/602206/mobs-rule-minecraft-stonesword-saga-2-by-nick-eliopulos/|title=Mobs Rule! (Minecraft Stonesword Saga #2)|website=Penguin Random House}}</ref>}}
